title: How many words makes a novella? - Quora

response.answer_text: A. Novellas generally run 20,000-50,000 words. About 30,000 words is average. While this number of words would be very common when pitching a nonfiction text.

There is no fixed definition of novella about the length of it. A novella is a text of written, fictional, narrative prose normally longer than a short story but shorter than a novel, it should be between 17,500 and 40,000 words.
